name: The Chosen One
description: The protagonist is destined to save the world according to fate and prophecy

name: Damsel in Distress
description: The protagonist must rescue a person who has been kidnapped or captured

name: Wrongly Accused
description: The protagonist has been wrongly accused and convicted of a crime

name: After the End
description: The story takes place in an apocalyptic setting

name: A Hero is Born
description: The story begins with the birth of the protagonist

name: Out of Job, into the Plot
description: The protagonist loses their job shortly before or after the action begins

name: Resurrected
description: The protagonist is brought back from the dead

name: The Quest
description: The protagonist must go on a dangerous quest

name: Enemies to Allies
description: The protagonist must work with a former enemy or rival against a greater threat

name: Secret Society
description: The protagonist takes on a powerful, secret, evil organisation

name: Alternate Universe
description: The protagonist is in a parallel world, different from their own

name: Impending Apocalypse
description: The protagonist must prevent an apocalyptic event

name: Mysterious Small Town
description: The story takes place in a small town full of secrets

name: Conjuring Evil
description: The protagonist must defeat a dark evil force which is conjured at the start of the story

name: Rags to Riches
description: The protagonist comes from a poor background but attains a large amount of wealth

name: Road Trip
description: The protagonist is on a road trip

name: Time Travel
description: The protagonist travels through time

name: Lost in Time
description: The protagonist is stuck in a different time period

name: Prophecy
description: The protagonist is driven by a prophecy

name: Dark Past
description: The protagonist has experienced great loss or hardship in the past

name: Redemption Arc
description: The protagonist wants to redeem themselves for bad deeds or horrible mistakes they've made in the past

name: Dystopia
description: The story takes place in a world where there is great injustice and suffering due to totalitarian rule

name: Fish Out of Water
description: The protagonist is in an unfamiliar and uncomfortable environment

name: Amateur Sleuth
description: The protagonist finds themselves involved in a mystery which they must solve despite having no experience solving mysteries

name: Alien Invasion
description: The story involves aliens arriving on Earth
